department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Rental of mobile cranes with operators for 2 years. Estimated labor cost is within $1000001 to $500000.
description: Provide labor, materials, tools and equipment for mobile crane rental with operators at CFB Gagetown.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Mobile Crane Rental with Operator

## Solicitation Details
* **Title**: RISO-W6898-240691 - Mobile Crane Rental with Operator, Gagetown, NB
* **Reference Number**: WS4523349786-Doc4540908420
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4523349786
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-16
* **Closing Date for Tenders**: 2024-05-14, 14:00:00 (Atlantic Time)
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Opportunity Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting contractors to express interest in a Standing Offer for Mobile Crane Rental with Operator services at 5 CDSB Gagetown, CFB Gagetown, Oromocto, NB. The Standing Offer will be for two years with an option to extend an additional year.

## Contractual Details
* **Estimated Cost**: $100,001 to $500,000
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services - Reservation of Items, Goods, Services or Rental of Equipment)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regional Details
* **Region of Opportunity**: New Brunswick
* **Region of Delivery**: New Brunswick

## Contact Information
*  **Gary Bryant** (SPAC/PSPC) - [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Description
The required services include the furnishing of Mobile Cranes with Operators at 5 CDSB Gagetown. The work will be requested on form CF-942, Call-Up Against a Standing Offer, as specified herein. All labour, material, tools, and equipment required for the services will be the responsibility of the contractor.

Please visit the Notice URL to access the full tender document
